name: BitMapsTest
description: Unit tests for the BitMaps class, focusing on various bit manipulation methods.

test_cases.name: testContains
test_cases.description: Tests the contains method of BitMaps, ensuring it correctly identifies set bits and handles boundary conditions.

test_cases.name: testGetLongBit
test_cases.description: Tests the getLongBit method of BitMaps, ensuring it correctly returns the bit value for given indices.

test_cases.name: testGetLongIndex
test_cases.description: Tests the getLongIndex method of BitMaps, ensuring it correctly returns the long index for given bit indices.

test_cases.name: testMod
test_cases.description: Tests the mod method of BitMaps, ensuring it functions as an unsigned modulus.

test_cases.name: testModEdgeCases
test_cases.description: Tests edge cases for the mod method of BitMaps, including division by zero and negative divisors.

test_cases.name: testNumberOfBitMaps
test_cases.description: Tests the numberOfBitMaps method of BitMaps, ensuring it correctly calculates the number of long arrays needed for a given number of bits.

test_cases.name: testSet
test_cases.description: Tests the set method of BitMaps, ensuring it correctly sets bits and verifies their state.
